CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Visit Product Page stage positioned above or below the Add to Wishlist stage?
SRP.A: The Visit Product Page stage is positioned {above} the Add to Wishlist stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Wishlist?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Wishlist is {3273}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Visit Product Page?
VE.A: The value of stage Visit Product Page is {4781}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Advertisement?
VE.A: The value of stage View Advertisement is {6148}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Advertisement, with a value of {6148}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Initiate Checkout, with a value of {682}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Cart to stage Initiate Checkout?
SC.A: Decreased by {1234} Users from stage Add to Cart to stage Initiate Checkout.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Advertisement to stage Visit Product Page?
SC.A: Decreased by {1367} Users from stage View Advertisement to stage Visit Product Page.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 5464? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 4027? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Add to Wishlist} stage has {3273}, the {Add to Cart} stage has {1916}, the {Initiate Checkout} stage has {682}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 2594 and 4027? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to {Add to Wishlist} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage View Advertisement to Visit Product Page, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Advertisement} to {Visit Product Page} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage View Advertisement to Visit Product Page, from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to stage {Add to Wishlist} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Visit Product Page} and {Add to Wishlist} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Add to Cart} and {Initiate Checkout} stages.
